Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Salt
Augment.Description: Corrosive Salt Guard: This item stores a caustic, insatiable power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power can come to the surface in the form of a noxious, corrosive salt that dissolves all substances.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Water
Augment.Description: Crushing Wave Guard: This item stores the unstoppable force of the ocean's fury deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, crushing enemies beneath a torrent of frigid water.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Magma
Augment.Description: Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heart of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Sight
Augment.Description: The bearer of this item gains the benefit of True Seeing spell continuously.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Spell Resistance
Augment.Description: Spell Resistance +22: +22 Enhancement bonus to Spell Resistance.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Healing Amplification
Augment.Description: Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +40 (Equipment bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Threat
Augment.Description: Incite +15: +15% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Wizardry
Augment.Description: Wizardry +6: +6 Enhancement bonus to spell points.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Empowered Healing
Augment.Description: Efficient Metamagic - Empower Healing II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Healing Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Spell Penetration
Augment.Description: Spell Penetration II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.

Augment.Name: Tempest Rune of Arcane Sigil
Augment.Description: Lesser Arcane Sigil: The arcane sigil inscribed on this item lowers the arcane spell failure chance by -5%.
